oracle.mapviewer.share
Class ArrayParameter

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.ArrayParameter

public class ArrayParameter
extends java.lang.Object

The ArrayParameter class defines a ARRAY type binding parameter for a predefined dynamic theme. The element type of the ARRAY can only be number or varchar.

See Also:
MapViewer

ArrayParameter

public ArrayParameter(java.lang.String typeName,
                      java.lang.Object value)
Constructor that constructs a ArrayParameter object.

Parameters:
typeName - name of the SQL ARRAY type defined in the database
value - the array object. The element type of the array can only be int, double or String

                      java.lang.Object value,

Constructor that constructs a ArrayParameter object.

Parameters:
typeName - name of the SQL ARRAY type defined in the database
value - the array object. The element type of the array can only be int, double or String
dataSource - the name of the dataSource where the SQL type is defined
